thread.title: Ivanka wanted her own White House office. So Trump gave her one. And you’re paying for it.
thread.title_full: Ivanka wanted her own White House office. So Trump gave her one. And you’re paying for it.

author: Graham Gremore
title: Ivanka wanted her own White House office. So Trump gave her one. And you’re paying for it.
text:
Hey, remember when Ivanka Trump first moved to Washington back in January and she assured everyone that she would not be playing a formal role in her father’s administration? 
Psyche! 
Two months later, she’s picking out the furnishings for her very own White House office. 
According to Politico : 
The powerful first daughter has secured her own office on the West Wing’s second floor — a space next to senior adviser Dina Powell, who was recently promoted to a position on the National Security Council. She is also in the process of obtaining a security clearance and is set to receive government-issued communications devices this week. 
That’s right, folks. The first daughter is getting all the perks of an official government employee, minus a salary… or the nuisance of being sworn in, any actual job responsibilities, or being legally accountable for anything. 
According to her attorney, Jamie Gorelick, Ivanka will serve as her dad’s “eyes and ears” by providing input on random things she has absolutely no knowledge about. 
Said Gorelick, “Having an adult child of the president who is actively engaged in the work of the administration is new ground. Our view is that the conservative approach is for Ivanka to voluntarily comply with the rules that would apply if she were a government employee, even though she is not.” 
So let’s get this straight… Americans are paying for Ivanka to be an official White House “volunteer” with security clearance and her own office, computer, cellphone, etc., but no official job title. On top of that, we’re just supposed to trust that she follows all the rules of a government employee, but if she doesn’t, there’s absolutely no way to hold her accountable. 
Do you find that incredibly irritating? Maybe these memes will help… If he ends up giving the 10 year old a job or a title, I will lose my mind. A post shared by emily (@sewknotwrite) on Mar 21, 2017 at 7:16am PDT 
#merkel bei #trump #ivankatrump A post shared by JvB (@j.von.b) on Mar 21, 2017 at 2:21am PDT
